list_definition.definition: to expand; to make greater; to improve

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We’ve succeeding in boosting the sales figures
Winning the game helped to boost his confidence.

list_definition.definition: a piece of help, encouragement etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This publicity will give our sales a real boost.
